name: Isle of Blood
description:
Extremely work in progress immersive sim heavily inspired by Bioshock and Dishonored. You can attack, teleport, mantle and that's about it.

Known issue: If you're being chased by an enemy and jump onto a surface it can't reach the game chugs (an issue with Godot 4's path finding).

Controls:

Move: WASD

Fire Righthand: Left Click

Fire Lefthand: Right Click

Teleport: Thumb 1 (sorry if you don't have thumb buttons)

Jump: Space

Crouch: Control

Run: Shift

Lean: Hold Middle Mouse
